import{getDejPrice,getMealPrice}from"./pricesCalc";var data=[{price:1.87,label:"Acheter X cookie$s"},{price:1.40,label:"Acheter X cannette$s"},{price:4,label:"Acheter X croque-monsieur$s/panini$s"},{price:"dej",label:"Aller X fois au point A"},{price:"meal",label:"Doubler X fois au RI"}];export function getOFPossibilitesAsList(remaining,menu,isGoingToPtA){var returnString="
";data.forEach(function(x){var amount=0;if(typeof x.price==="number"){amount=Math.floor(remaining/x.price);}else{amount=Math.floor(remaining/(x.price==="dej"?getDejPrice(menu):getMealPrice(menu)));}if(amount>0&&(!isGoingToPtA||x.price!=="dej")){returnString+="- "+x.label.replace('X',amount).replaceAll(amount>1?'$':'$s','')+"
";}});return returnString;}export function getNEGPossibilitesAsList(remaining,menu,dejNumber){var returnString="
";var missing=Math.abs(remaining);if(dejNumber>0){var dejAmount=Math.ceil(missing/getDejPrice(menu));if(dejAmount>dejNumber){var stillMissing=(dejAmount-dejNumber)*getDejPrice(menu);var mealAmount=Math.ceil(stillMissing/getMealPrice(menu));returnString+=" - Ne pas aller au point A du tout et ne pas aller au RI "+mealAmount+" fois
";}else{returnString+="- Ne pas aller au point A "+dejAmount+" fois
";}}var mealAmountB=Math.ceil(missing/getMealPrice(menu));returnString+="- Ne pas aller au RI "+mealAmountB+" fois";return returnString;}
